name: DualClock 2
subtitle: Two time zones system-wide
description:
Two time zones on the Lock Screen and in the status bar.

DualClock 2 is the successor to DualClock, re-written in Swift, bugs fixed and more intelligence. DualClock 2 allows users to show up to two different time zones on the Lock Screen and in the status bar. Supports iPad and iPhone.

Supports iOS 14+
author: Ginsu

changes: Now reacts to location/time zone changes.
Improved lock screen and statusbar appearance.
Update icon when location/time zone changes.
Fix status bar toggle not taking effect.
Fix issue with enabling/disabling the tweak.
